name: Rocket Raider
description:
Rocket Raider is a level based runner/shooter about a red spaceship searching the galaxy for 40 pink gems. The game has 4 levels and is about a 20 min play all the way through. It has touch screen support, and is possible to play on mobile if you load the web page on a compatible device. 

It was made in under 2 weeks and I have no plans for future updates or development as this was only made to practice my Unity 2D skills.
